resources.string: Tikfans - Get followers and likes for TT
You must be logged in to do that.
Your campaign will be removed. You can not see the campaign again, your action can not undo. Are you sure to remove your campaign?
By continue, you agree with our Privacy Policy
No internet connection. Please check your network and try again
Your campaign appear here. Click add button to create campaign to get followers for your TT account.
Please make sure your video is live for everybody around the world
Failed to load ads. Please try later
You have to update latest version to using this app.
Select number of followers that you want to have

Do not delete the video which you added in this campaign because people will can not found your video to follow to you. We will remove your campaign without refund if people can not watch your video.\n\nSome people may unfollow you or their account have been deleted, so real follower maybe less than your order.
Follow, view and like other profiles to earn coin
Use coin to create campaign for your profiles
Select number of followers, views, likes for your profiles
Check the progress and who followed, view and like your profiles
Thank you for using this app
Do this application useful to you? Please give us your feedback. Thank you so much.
Contact us if you have any problems with in app purchase by email cptstudio.help@gmail.com
Buy failed, please contact if you lose money.
%s invite you to use Tikfans app which can help you boost followers for your TT profiles
Let\'s install Tikfans together! Both you and I will get 1000 coin bonus when you install this app by my refer link:\n
Invite your friend and earn 1000 coin for each referral by refer link bellow:
You earned total %d coin by invited your friends. This is list of your referral
Get refer link error. Please try later

You don\'t have referral, invite your friend to earn coin. \nTips: Make a TT video to promote this app and put your refer link, or comment your refer link to other video. Many people can found your refer link and you can earn big coin when they install this app
No profiles now. You can reload or click earn coin
Follow and like this profiles after watching video to receive coin. We will block your account if you cheating.
We limit number of campaigns less than %d. You reached the limitation. Delete completed campaigns to create a new campaign.
List of followers on your profiles
How to get more followers on Tikfans

First, You need to collect the coin by follow other profiles or make a purchase.\nwhen enough coin, You can create campaign to promote your profiles: in Campaign tab -> add button -> select your profiles and make order number of followers you want
Do Tikfans generate automatic followers? Is it safe for your profiles?
No. As it is against TT terms and condition. All followers is real user. It is very safe with your profiles
Why real followers is not equal with order when create campaign
Sometime user follow your profiles then unfollow or their account have been removed, so real followers maybe less than your order.
Can I unfollow the profiles which I follow to earn coin?

You can not do it. If other people follow then unfollow, real followers of your profiles will be reduce. So we do not allow you unfollow the profiles you followed on this app. If you unfollow your profiles you followed on this app, We will block your account
Please wait while we checking if you have followed this profiles
If we found you unfollow any profiles, we may block your account.
We We detected you unfollowing %d users .\nIf you still unfollow other users, your account will be blocked.
TT does not allow follow too fast. Please wait a while for next follower. You also can click earn coin while waiting.

You have to follow this profiles and like this video to get coin. If you followed and liked but can not get coin, please check if your account logged in TT app is %s. Sometime system delay so please try again.
Why I follow the profiles on TT app but cannot get coin when back to this app.
If you followed this profiles but can not get coin, please check if your account logged in this app and TT app is same or not.
We so sorry to notice that we are maintain this app for keep it work well. It will take few hours.\nPlease try again later.
If you found this user unfollow your profiles, you can report to us. We will block all cheating users.
Today you have followed %d profiles. Please continue to follow tomorrow or using other account. You can upgrade to a VIP account to get 10 more daily limited followers
Today you have followed %d profiles. Please continue to follow tomorrow or using other account.
DO NOT unfollow any profiles or unlike any videos. we will block your account if you unfollow any profiles or unlike any videos.
Please both FOLLOW and LIKE to this profiles and video.
You need watch video at least %d second before subscribing this profiles. If not TT will cancel your follower. Please watching video again.
Your account have a problem. Send feedback to cptstudio.help@gmail.com for support

- Remove ads
- Reduce 10% campaign cost
- Remove countdown timer after followed profiles.
- Campaign limit up to 10.
- Add 10 daily quotas in followers and Like tabs
You upgraded to a VIP account for %s.
We released new app to help you to get new followers only from your country. Do you want to install it?
Watch ads video and earn coin
Not enough coin to create campaign
You have not followed this profiles and liked this video.
Please finish watching the video before subscribing this profiles and liking this video
Select number of likes that you want to have
No video to like now. Reload or click earn coin
Click like button to redirect to the video on TT. Like video and return this app. Your account you logged in this app and TT app must be same.
TT does not allow likes video too fast. Please wait a while for next video. You also can click earn coin while waiting.
Follow failed. Please try with other profiles
If we found you unlike any video, we may block your account.
DO NOT unlike any video. we will block your account if you unlike other video.
Today you have liked %d videos. Please continue to like tomorrow or using other account.
Please wait while we checking if you have liked this video
You have not liked to this video

You have to click like this video to get coin. If you liked this video but can not get coin, please check if your account logged in this app and TT app is same or not. Sometime system delay so please try again.
Like failed, Please try with other video
You need watch video at least %d second before liking this video. If not TT will cancel your like. Please watching video again.
List of likes on your video
Please finish watching the video before like to this video
You followed this profiles but you have not liked to this video. Please like this video again.
You will be charged %s + tax automatically every month until you cancel. Cancel anytime in Subscription on Google Play.
Billing starts at the end of 3 days free trial. You will be charged %s + tax automatically every 3 months until you cancel. Cancel anytime in Subscription on Google Play
Billing starts at the end of 7 days free trial. You will be charged %s + tax automatically every year until you cancel. Cancel anytime in Subscription on Google Play
*Input your TT username, not your display name
There is a running campaign for your profiles or video, you need to wait for it finish or try with other video.
This is list of user which you unfollowed. You have to follow them again to avoid block your account. If you violate too many times, we will block your account forever.
You don\'t have any video on your profiles. You need upload video to promote. Please set your account to public, so we can found your video.
How to get link: open your video on TT App -> share button -> copy link
Wrong video link, please try again with other.

TT allows users to follow to 10000 channels. You have now followed to 10000 channels. So please create a new account to continue to follow. If you still use this account, TT will identify you as a spammer.
Upgrade to VIP account to get more benefit. Tap here to get more information
Username not found, please check username again
